Name: Shield of Shalwend
About the game: Join Shalwend, Brightblayde, and Danjirus as they attempt to defend a castle in Elf territory for 25 days. This story of bravery, adventure, and humor is based on true events that culminated in Shalwend being proclaimed as a Wargod. As you kill wave after wave of elven drones, you will be rewarded higher standing in the pantheon of Norse gods. Though their numbers are great, you are armed with Shalwendâ€™s lightning quick reflexes and tremendous strength. Time your attacks and unleash your rage using the power of the Wargods!
